## Hello! 
> I break my arch install pretty much every week. Fixing it takes hours but I’ve learned most of what I know that way. Porting random projects to rust is one of my favorite ways to kill time. I’m all in on linux and foss. Messing with open tools and figuring out how they tick is what keeps me hooked. Most of my work lives on the edge between “this could break everything” and “that actually turned out alright.” If it looks like I’m making it up as I go, that’s only because I am.
